---
title: "QTLretrievR"
---

QTLretrievR is an R package designed to streamline molecular Quantitative Trait Locus (QTL) mapping, and perform downstream analyses. 

## Installation

Install QTLretrievR from [GitHub](https://github.com/deweyhannah/QTLretrievR)
```{r}
#| eval: false
devtools::install_github("deweyhannah/QTLretrievR")
```

## Documentation

To see examples of how to use QTLretrievR, please see the "Articles" tab above.
